channel.title: Making myself a member
channel.description: I downloaded project czar source.. I know how to make myself a member, but when I login and try to go in portal it says i'm not a member.. help please.

item.title: Making myself a member
item.dc:creator: @iownall3 iownall3
item.description:
@iownall3 wrote:

Thanks guys, but I know how to do that, I just don’t know why it won’t let me in the member portal after I’ve done that.

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself a member
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Allright…
There are one of to ways to make yourself a member if you are on a czar based source.
You can either go into your character notepad inside of the file called “Characters”
Or…
If you have this…
You can go into a folder called “Data”
If you have this notepad called “Members” or “members”
Go into it…
Add the names seperated by lines that you want to be members.
Just remove the names from the list to make them non-members again.

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself a member
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

ok what you need to do is go to your character folder and open your username

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2764 character-posy = 2766 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = adsl-69-212-23-52.dsl.milwwi.sbcglobal.net character-lastlogin = 20080028 character-energy = 7 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 421
This Should = 0
character-ismember = 0
Change It To 1
character-ismember = 1

YW!

Read full topic
